objects.specification: A large flat floor surface covering the entire classroom with a muted stone earth texture, slightly rough to simulate natural stone, providing a durable non-slip finish.
A vertical wall painted in a neutral beige base color with subtle dinosaur skin pattern accents in stone gray, serving as the structural front boundary of the classroom.
A vertical wall painted in a neutral beige base color with subtle dinosaur skin pattern accents in stone gray, serving as the structural back boundary of the classroom.
A vertical wall painted in a neutral beige base color with subtle dinosaur skin pattern accents in stone gray, serving as the structural left boundary of the classroom.
A vertical wall painted in a neutral beige base color with subtle dinosaur skin pattern accents in stone gray, serving as the structural right boundary of the classroom.
A large rectangular chalkboard with a deep dark green writing surface framed by a slender wooden border in dark brown earthy tone, matte finish to minimize glare and accept chalk cleanly.
A large teacher's desk with a solid wood rectangular top in warm brown finish, visible wood grain texture, sturdy squared legs, and ample tabletop space for teaching materials.
A student desk with a compact rectangular tabletop in earthy green finish atop four dark brown metal legs, with a slight matte surface for individual student use.
A student chair with a molded seat and back in earthy brown plastic featuring subtle dinosaur footprint embossing, supported by a dark brown metal four-leg frame in ergonomic design.

A round wall-mounted analog clock with a white glossy face, black hour markers and hands, a thin brushed metal frame, and a clear protective glass cover.
A potted plant with lush green fern-like leaves emerging from a simple terracotta-colored ceramic pot, adding a touch of natural greenery.

A large rectangular window with a slim pale blue frame and clear glass pane, allowing abundant natural light into the classroom.
A pair of long light beige curtains printed with subtle dinosaur pattern in muted greens and browns, hanging in soft folds from a simple rod, framing the window.
A vinyl floor decal depicting a continuous trail of dark brown dinosaur footprints, seamlessly adhered to the floor surface and leading toward the teacher's desk for an immersive prehistoric touch.
